greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: The array in A059219 read by antidiagonals in 'up' direction.
link: G. C. Greubel, Table of n, a(n) for the first 50 rows, flattened
Index entries for sequences related to boustrophedon transform
mathematica: max = 9; t[0, 0] = 1; t[0, _?EvenQ] = 0; t[_?OddQ, 0] = 0; t[n_, k_] /; OddQ[n + k] (* up *) := t[n, k] = t[n+1, k-1] + Sum[t[n, j], {j, 0, k-1}]; t[n_, k_] /; EvenQ[n + k] (* down *) := t[n, k] = t[n-1, k+1] + Sum[t[j, k], {j, 0, n-1}]; Table[t[n - k, k], {n, 0, max}, {k, 0, n}] // Flatten (* _Jean-François Alcover_, Aug 19 2013 *)
results.author: _N. J. A. Sloane_, Jan 18 2001
ext: More terms from _Floor van Lamoen_, Jan 19 2001
